turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm looking to order a beverage from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a tall caramel macchiato with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on Spruce Street in Philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, one moment while i send your order to that location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a tall caramel macchiato with almond milk to be picked up at the starbucks on spruce street in philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
